# The Future of AI Regulation

The AI industry is experiencing 45% year-over-year growth according to [McKinsey 2024](https://example.
com/report), 67% of enterprises have implemented AI governance.
Industry experts predict that 80% of jurisdictions will have AI-specific laws by 2026.

## Current Landscape

Recent studies show that:
- Regulation frameworks are emerging across 12 countries
- Investment reached $50,000,000 in Q4 2024
- Major tech companies are adopting self-regulation protocols

According to [Gartner's 2024 report](https://gartner.
